law.text: No execution may issue upon nor may any levy be made against any property of the estate under any judgment against a decedent or a personal representative, but this section shall not be construed to prevent the enforcement of mortgages, pledges or liens upon real or personal property in an appropriate proceeding.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1988.
